message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to own this truly unique product. To kick things off, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,300,000. I believe this reflects its inherent value and potential.
Hello Alice, I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. Given my budget constraints, I am willing to offer $950,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but the price you're suggesting doesn't reflect the true value of this product.  I'm willing to come down to $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair compromise.
Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. Based on my assessment, I would like to counter with an offer of $1,100,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. How about we settle on $1,150,000?
Alice, I appreciate your effort in coming closer to my offer. I would like to counter with $1,125,000 for the product.
